ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: As a graduate in computer science, I am an expert in technology and software development. I have a strong foundation in computer science theory and programming languages, and I am trained to work on a wide range of technology-related projects. I specialize in web and mobile app development, and I have a great ability to solve complex technical problems. I enjoy working in teams and collaborating with other developers to create innovative and high-quality solutions. In addition to my academic background, I also have experience in the workforce and have worked at various companies as a software developer. This has given me practical skills and the opportunity to work on real, challenging projects.

PORTFOLIO.TS_SIMPLE: A collection of packages for simplifying your life. The most common packages contain simple functions that I used in a lot of my projects. By this way I try to unify that functions in a repository and testing to avoid bugs.
PORTFOLIO.RASPBOT: Raspbot is a simple program to listen Telegram bot channel
PORTFOLIO.NGX_CARDS: A compilation of components for angular to display profile info for websites
